name: The Undergarden (itch)
description:
A mermaid explores the depths in this eerie puzzle exploration game.

WASD - Move

Mouse - Move Camera

SPACE - Swim Up

Left Shift - Swim Down

H - Hint

It might be quite tricky to do without using the hints, but I included the hint button just in case .  Listen for important sounds and explore high and low.  Collect pearls and activate switches.

I was going for an environmental narrative with this project and tried to keep HUD to a minimum this time. Hopefully it isn't too difficult to find your way.

Created by Circumpunk-KKB in Unity
